flawed_nl_solution:
8 years ago James had 20-8=<<20-8=12>>12 years
So 8 years ago John had 12*2=24 years experience
That means John has 24+8=<<24+8=32>>32 years experience
So Mike has 32-16=<<32-16=18>>18 years of experience
So together they have 20+32+18=<<20+32+18=70>>70 years experience
#### 70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
